title: Kindan Wedding
alternative_title: 禁断婚 ; Forbidden Marriage ; Forbidden Wedding ; Lover's Textbook ; The Proper Steps to a Wedding
status: 禁断婚 ; Forbidden Marriage ; Forbidden Wedding ; Lover's Textbook ; The Proper Steps to a Wedding
description:
Description :
        From Shoujo Manga Maniac:
Hana dreams of falling in love with a guy who is like a prince. She thinks that she will meet her prince by just believing. Finally she gets to meet the prince of her dreams; however, when Hana goes home, she's forced to attend a match-making session! And the prince, Ichiya, appears right before her. Hana believs that this is a destined match, but little does she know that Ichiya is not your average prince...!?

Includes two side stories;
The Proper Steps to a Wedding
Lover's Textbook

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4: The Proper Steps To A Wedding
Vol.1 Chapter 3.5 : The Proper Steps To A Wedding
